select q_index,q_title,q_option, q_member,q_content,q_file,q_date,q_hits,q_group,q_indent,q_step, case q_option when q_option != '공지' then '공지' when q_option = '공지' then q_index else q_group end as 'q_op' from qna
order by field(q_op, '공지') desc, q_group desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};
select count(q_index) from qna where q_index > 0
select q_index,q_title,q_option,q_member,q_content,q_file,q_date,q_hits,q_group,q_indent,q_step from qna where q_index >0 order by q_index desc, q_date desc limit #{page}, 10

select q_index,q_title,q_option,q_member,q_content,q_file,q_date,q_hits,q_group,q_indent,q_step, case q_option when q_option = '공지' then q_index else '공지' end 'q_op' from qna where q_index >0 order by q_op desc, q_date desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.insert: insert into qna(q_title, q_member, q_content, q_date, q_group, q_step) values(#{qTitle}, #{qMember}, #{qContent}, now(), #{qGroup}, 1)
